name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Hero Mode Additional Stage Set 2
summary: Four stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Enmity of the Triumphant Ma," "Talent Above All," "Entering Shu," and "Liao at Hefei." "Enmity of the Triumphant Ma," "Talent Above All," and "Liao at Hefei" are story/movie only stages.
